notes.name: Armor
notes.content:
## Armor

She has armor plating integrated into her chasis, which provides an additional 1/1 defense.

description.name: Convincing Demeanor
description.description: Remove <setback></setback> per rank of Convincing Demeanor from any Deception or Skulduggery check.

description.name: Durable
description.description: The character may reduce a Critical Injury result he suffers by 10 per rank of Durable, to a minimum of one.

description.name: Nobody's Fool
description.description: The difficulty of any Charm, Coercion, or Deception checks attempted against the character is upgraded once for each rank of Nobody's Fool.

description.name: Black Market Contacts
description.description: When looking to purchase illegal, exotic, or black market goods, the character may decrease an item's rarity by one level per rank in Black Market Goods. For each level an item's rarity is decreased, it's cost increases by 50% of its base cost.

notes.name: Equipment
notes.content:
#Gear

- Backpack
- Utility Belt


- Comlink
- Datapad
- Comm Scrambler
- Thermal Cloak
- Glow Rods (2)
- Power Packs (3)
- Archaeologist's Tools
- Electrobinoculars
- General Purpose Scanner
- Climbing Gear
- Breath Mask
- Emergency Repair Patches (6)
- Stimpacks (6)
- Medpac
- Frag Grenades (4)


#Armor

| Type         | Defense | Soak | Encum | HP | Special |
|:------------:|:-------:|:----:|:-----:|:--:|:-------:|
| Padded Armor | 0       | 2    | 2     | 0  | -       |

#Weapons

| Type            | Skill          | Damage | Crit | Range   | Encum | HP | Special             |
|:---------------:|:--------------:|:------:|:----:|:-------:|:-----:|:--:|:-------------------:|
| Blaster Rifle   | Ranged - Heavy | 9      | 3    | Long    | 4     | 4  | Stun Setting        |
| Vibroknife      | Melee          | +1     | 2    | Engaged | 1     | 2  | Pierce 2, Vicious 1 |
| Holdout Blaster | Ranged - Light | 5      | 4    | Short   | 1     | 1  | Stun Setting        |

armor.name: Modified Heavy Battle Armor
armor.upgrades:
**Cortosis Weave** - Wearer immune to Pierce and Breach.

**Strength Enhancing System** - Increase's wearer's Brawn by 1 point while wearing this armor.

This does not increase soak or wound threshold.

weapons.name: Vibroknife
weapons.upgrades:
**Superior** - Add automatic <advantage></advantage> to rolls.

Increase base damage by 1.

**Serrated Edge** - Grant weapon Vicious (+1) quality.

weapons.name: Force Pike
weapons.upgrades:
**Superior** - Add automatic <advantage></advantage> to rolls.

Increase base damage by 1.

**Serrated Edge** - Grant weapon Vicious (+1) quality.

**Stun Pulse** - Weapon gains Stun 2 quality.
(Mod - +3 Stun quality.)

armor.name: Modified Heavy Battle Armor
armor.upgrades:
- *Cortosis Weave*
 - wearer immune to Pierce and Breach
- *Superior Armor Construction*
 - +1 Soak, -2 Encumbrance
- *Energy Dispersion System*
 - Increase soak by 2 for Strain damage

weapons.name: Heavy Blaster Pistol
weapons.upgrades:
- *Superior*
 - +1 damage, +1 <advantage></advantage> on each check made for this weapon
- *Shadowsheath*
 - Adds <difficulty></difficulty><difficulty></difficulty> to checks made to detect this weapon or its holster

weapons.name: Vibroknife
weapons.upgrades:
- *Serrated Edge*
 - +1 Vicious
- *Monomolecular Edge*
 - decreases crit rating by 1

armor.name: Custom Heavy Battle Armor
armor.upgrades:
Superior Armor Customization: Armor gains the Superior Quality (Encumbrance -1, Soak +1)

Cortosis Weave: Armor gains the Cortosis quality (Soak is Immune to Pierce and Breach)

Energy Dispersion System: When reducing strain damage by the character's soak, count the character's soak as two higher.

weapons.name: Basic Lightsaber
weapons.upgrades:
Dantari Crystal
Base Modifiers: Installing this crystal changes a
lightsaber’s base damage to 7 and critical rating to
2, and the lightsaber gains the Breach 1 and Sunder
weapon qualities. When making a Force power check
as part of a combat check, a character using a lightsaber
with a Dantari crystal may spend Ω to recover
2 strain. If the crystal is ever removed, the lightsaber
loses these qualities and abilities, and reverts to its
previous base damage and critical rating.
Modification Options: 1 Decrease the weapon’s
critical rating by one to a minimum of 1 Mod, 2 Damage
+1 Mods.
Hard Points Required: 2.
Price: (R) 12,000 credits.

armor.name: Armored Robes
armor.upgrades: Superior Armor Customization, Energy Dispersion System

weapons.name: Obi Wan's Lightsaber
weapons.upgrades: Superior Weapon Customization, Extended hilt, Dantari Crystal

notes.name: Lightsaber Details
notes.content:
## Dantari Crystal

When making a Force power check as part of a combat check, a character using a lightsaber with a Dantari crystal may spend <forcepoint></forcepoint> to recover 2 strain.

## Superior

Add automatic <advantage></advantage> on all checks related to weapon's use, and its base damage is increased by 1.

armor.name: Sith Armor
armor.upgrades: Vacuum Sealed, Strength Enhancing System, Cortosis Weave, Superior

weapons.name: Haran (Lightsaber)
weapons.upgrades: Ilum Crystal (all mods), Superior Hilt, on a <triumph></triumph>, may Sunder a weapon, causing it to immediately be destroyed.

notes.name: Motivations and Concept
notes.content:
High Concept: "Veteran SCP Soldier"

--- | Strength: _Patient_ | Flaw: _Intolerance_ | |:---------------------:|:---------------------:| | Your character is always willing to wait and knows the power of being calm. By waiting for the right opportunity, your character avoids all manner of unpleasant and dangerous situations. However, when such an opportunity presents itself, your character acts swiftly and decisively. | For whatever reason, your character harbors some prejudices toward a group of people. These may be relatively “minor” biases, or they may give rise to an intense emotion of hatred or revulsion. Whatever form it takes, remember that intolerance is based more in emotion than rationality. | | Desire: _Protector_ | Fear: _Isolation_ | |:---------------------:|:---------------------:| | Your character tries to protect those around her. Your character goes out of their way to try to protect or save others, without a second throught for their safety. | Your character fears being isolated from other people and being doomed to live and die alone.Maybe this drives them to seek out relationships with anyone and everyone, even when a relationship is unpleasant or unhealthy. |
